description:
## Features
* Change IP to 70 countries 
* Access Streaming sites 
* Ad Blocking & Malware prevention
* Connect 6 devices. Share account.
* No Logs. Shared IPs. 
* Go faster with IKEv2 VPN
summary:
VPNArea means Privacy, Security, Freedom.
Stay safe and secure with an easy to use VPN. Even grandma can do it.
author: Offshore Security LTD
